com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
Class ServerFactoryLocator

java.lang.Object
  com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.ServerFactoryLocator

public class ServerFactoryLocator
extends Object

This locator object is a singleton that is used to obtain the factory that will be used to create server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews

Method Summary
 ServerFactory getFactory(String serverName)
          Lookup the factory identified by serverName.
static ServerFactoryLocator getInstance(Logger logger)
          Get the singleton instance of the locator.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static ServerFactoryLocator getInstance(Logger logger)
Get the singleton instance of the locator. If the singleton has not already been created it will be created and initialised as a side-effect.

Returns:
The singleton instance of the locator.

getFactory

public ServerFactory getFactory(String serverName)
Lookup the factory identified by serverName.

Parameters:
serverName - The server name.
Returns:
The factory that creates server objects identified by the server name.
